description:
Bunji wholeheartly draws something in his sketchbook. When Mom asks what it is, he says it`s boobs. So has spring come around the corner for Bunji? As Mom wonders what to do, the sentimental holy spirit appears.
Celebrity?
Mr. Mizunuma makes a call to Mom. He`s going to Mom`s place with an interviewer who is going to interview her. Mom who completely forgot about such a promise hurries to... ; Dad took Bunji and Fumi to a nearby supermarket to get dinner ingredients. "I am actually a professional shopper even though I don`t look like one!" So that`s what Dad boasts but...; Mom entrusted Ai to look after pet dog Jon. When she goes to fetch it, Jon happily runs around in Mr. Ooya`s big garden, that is right next to Ai`s apartment - it looks like he fell in love too...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Boobs / Celebrity? / Super Dad / Jon and Mary
おっぱい / セレブ? / スーパーとうさん / ジョンとメリー
